intro.title: B2B ENTERPRISE IN THE SWISS MARKET
intro.subtitle: We sell specialised solutions

productDesign.title: DESIGN A PRODUCT
productDesign.subtitle: Non-Food Concept
productDesign.subtitle2: A successful sale starts with a great design. Victory Switzerland brings your product straight to the market.
productDesign.bigText: We will support you from A to Z, transforming your idea into a tangible product. Follow the process step by step. You bring the chaos, we'll bring the skill.
productDesign.text1: Our community of designers can work to develop your product either from a single sheet of paper, or from a more elaborated concept.
productDesign.text2: Have you come across a trendy product in the market? Do even better and stick out from your competitors.

production.title: PRODUCTION
production.subtitle: Developing the perfect product is a challenge we enjoy as we do everything we can to make it work.
production.text1: We'll find the right factory among an international selection and use our experience and influence to offer you a better price than your business would have got alone.
production.text2: Save time and money by investing in our services. Your CFO will love us.
production.text3: Today you have access to infinite possibilities to develop your product at the desired quality and price. This offer is so vast that it's easy to lose yourself. Yet another reason to work with us.

import.title: IMPORT
import.subtitle: There are several ways to transport your product from point A to point B. The real question is, does your transporter work in an effective and efficient way? We do what is needed to optimise each delivery.
import.text1: If you import goods into Switzerland or elsewhere, it needs to be regulated under local legislation. There is therefore a risk of it getting stuck at customs.
import.text2: To avoid this problem, we ensure that your goods conform to regulations before loading.

logistic.title: LOGISTICS
logistic.subtitle: We offer a quality logistical service. Our team depends on your needs and makes bespoke suggestions at the best prices. Our work ends when the customer receives their order and feels the thrill of victory!

bullet1.title: Maintenance
bullet1.description: Upon request, we stock the goods in our locations until the required delivery date.

bullet2.title: Labelling
bullet2.description: Relay relevant information about the characteristics and qualities of the product, as well as its handling, reducing the risks of wear and tear or loss.

bullet3.title: Packaging
bullet3.description: Ease the number, distribution and transporting of packages.

bullet4.title: Stock management
bullet4.description: We manage warehouses where we stock and organise your supply. This management is convened with our customer based on their needs.

bullet5.title: Efficient procurement cycle
bullet5.description: This results in an added value, positively influencing the final product price and end customer. Our team will be happy to offer you a bespoke solution.

fuhlen.title: FEEL THE VICTORY
fuhlen.subtitle: For customers who don't want to create their own collection, we offer an alternative solution.
fuhlen.text1: Victory Shop is a digital platform on which the most important European wholesalers stand side by side. All of their best products in one basket. All you need to do is click below.

contact.title: Sign up for full information on our price lists.
contact.subtitle: We will deal with your request and contact you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Surname

footer.text: Victory Switzerland Sàrl, founded in 2012, is an importer/wholesaler. We make purchases across the whole world for our customers. With such diversity, our product range is constantly expanding; we import over 1000 different items each year.
footer.title: Do you have any questions?

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: To our valued customers, we'd like to give you a glimpse of our activities and expertise.
about.text1: Victory Switzerland GmbH has been active since its foundation in 2021 as an importer and wholesaler, and purchases for its international customers. Due to such diversity, our product assortment is constantly expanding.
about.text2: Our international team works in synergy, enriching our processes. Our cultural differences do not separate us but rather make us stronger. We are committed to ethical and moral values which determine our philosophies around work and life.

callyou.title: Contact
callyou.text: Thank you for your submission! We'll call you back.
